infos.value: *Wheeze* *wheeze*
*Pant* *pant* *pant*
Give up. You have no hope of defeating me.
Talk all you want! I'm not giving up!
...Because—!
I...I-I love Machérie!
As I wonder what buffoon could be shouting my name throughout the halls...it's you.
Wh-what...!?
What are you thinking...? Butting in on this...nonsense...
Machérie! How I've longed to see you again!
...What are you doing here?
Isn't in obvious? I'm here to rescue you.
...And that drove you to engage in such folly...?
That's the power of love, I guess.
And you are...?
I am of Leonis. I happened to meet Camillo here.
Precisely.
Machérie, listen. Don't get the wrong idea about me and Elsirelle.
We're just partners of circumstance. I'm still a hundred-percent your man.
Why would one sworn to Leonis bare their blade against Sterne?
Because Lord Sterne has abandoned righteousness. That much I can sense.
...I see.
Hey, Machérie. You're not...ignoring me, are you?
...It would seem as such.
Do as you wish. I am only doing as I see fit.
You think you can pierce through this many who bar your path?
There is no going back for me.
...Very well, then.
